main event: Multiple witnesses observed an unidentified object in the sky over Sandy Hook, Connecticut, in February 1966.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 1.5 hours,The object appeared to rise in the eastern sky,The witness, Mrs. Dammar, described the object as much brighter than any star and moving faster than any plane she had seen,5 witnesses confirmed seeing the object,There were no photographs taken during the sighting.
sighted object: unidentified bright object in the sky
witness description: Mrs. Alma Dammar and her neighbors who observed the object
